Christopher Johnson is an entrepreneur who created a business, <nowiki>[[http://www.ifpeople.net|ifPeople]]</nowiki>, that uses and promotes Free Software through its services and business model. Christopher has been a linux user since 2002, when <nowiki>[[http://www.vialibre.org.ar|Fundacion Via Libre]]</nowiki> set up the business with its first two linux installations (Debian). He uses Ubuntu linux on an HP2510p laptop and on all the computers in ifPeople's office.
